TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TraceSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class TraceSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 跟踪服务。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET trace service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的内容的方法 `trace` 。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file `trace` section. Trace 节配置 ASP.NET 跟踪功能，并控制如何收集、存储和显示跟踪结果。The trace section configures the ASP.NET trace functionality and controls how trace results are gathered, stored, and displayed. 启用跟踪后，每个页面请求会生成跟踪消息，这些消息可以追加到页面输出或存储在应用程序跟踪日志中。When tracing is enabled, each page request generates trace messages that can be appended to the page output or stored in an application trace log. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器 (Trace) 来查看跟踪日志的内容。You can use the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) to view the contents of the trace log. > [!NOTE] > Machine.config 文件中的配置层次结构部分和 Web.config 文件中允许使用元素。The element is allowed in the section of the configuration hierarchy in the Machine.config file and the Web.config files. 不允许在 Web 子目录的配置文件中使用。It is not allowed in configuration files of Web subdirectories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类型。The following code example shows how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/CS/tracesection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/VB/tracesection.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

related.span: 如何：在跟踪查看器中查看跟踪信息

span.span: How to: View Trace Information with the Trace Viewer

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MostRecent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MostRecent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否总是将最近的请求存储在服务器中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the most recent requests are always stored on the server.

value.span: 如果总是将最近的请求存储在跟踪日志中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the most recent requests are always stored in the trace log; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求按到达的顺序存储在跟踪日志中，直到达到在属性中指定的请求数 。Requests are stored in the trace log in the order they arrive, up to the number of requests specified in the property. 当达到请求限制并且为时 `true` ，将自动丢弃较早的请求，并将新请求继续添加到日志中。When the request limit is reached and is `true`, older requests are automatically discarded and new requests continue to be added to the log. 当达到请求限制并且为时 `false` ，将丢弃新请求，直到从日志中删除以前的请求或增加请求限制。When the request limit is reached and is `false`, new requests are discarded until earlier requests are removed from the log or the request limit is increased. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RequestLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对 ASP.NET 为其存储跟踪信息的应用程序的最大请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests to the application for which ASP.NET stores trace information.

value.span: 存储在服务器上的最大请求数。

span.span: The maximum number of requests to store on the server.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最大请求限制为10000。The maximum request limit is 10,000. 如果指定一个大于10000的值，则 ASP.NET 将以无提示方式向下舍入到10000。If a value greater than 10,000 is specified, it is silently rounded down to 10,000 by ASP.NET. 属性获取或设置一个值，该值确定存储在服务器上的请求是最近的请求还是到达的第一个请求。The property gets or sets a value that determines whether the requests stored on the server are the most recent requests or the first requests to arrive. **注意** 当请求数超过此设置施加的限制且 为时 `false` ，跟踪日志中将不会有更多的请求存储。**Note** When the number of requests exceeds the limit imposed by this setting and is `false`, no more requests are stored in the trace log. 如果 为 `true` ，则会将最近的请求存储到此设置施加的限制中，而较早的请求将被丢弃。If is `true`, the most recent requests are stored up to the limit imposed by this setting and older requests are discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
